about_the_game:
The game is not complete. Mechanics are missing, so if you like it and want to see what it can offer, don't hesitate to add it to your wishlist.

Ravengrave 1: Iron Bonds is a pixel art game focused on blacksmithing, controlled entirely with the mouse. Take on the role of a young apprentice who must master the craft to repay a massive debt.

  • Forge with precision: Purchase materials, melt them down, and mold them to craft items using an interactive blacksmithing system.

  • Management and trade: Run your smithy, balance costs, upgrade your equipment, and meet customer demands.

  • Deep narrative: Uncover the story behind your father's debt while tending to the village’s needs.

  • Strategic survival: Choose between completing main quests, handling side commissions, or mass-selling to keep your business afloat.

With detailed pixel art and gameplay that is both accessible and challenging, Ravengrave 1: Iron Bonds offers an immersive experience of forging and survival. Will you forge your own destiny, or will the weight of debt crush you?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: You’re a young apprentice when your world falls apart: your father has fled, leaving you behind with the blacksmith... and a crushing debt. You must master blacksmithing from scratch to survive. Will you rise to the challenge and forge your own path, or will the pressure break you first?
